product_name: Patagonia Pembroke Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The highly versatile men's Patagonia Pembroke Rain Jacket gives you rugged all-weather performance with a crisp, clean metropolitan design that fits in downtown or up in the mountains. Waterproof, windproof 2.5-layer nylon stretch laminate has custom backer print and a durable water repellent finish. Fully adjustable hood snaps off when not needed. Chest pocket and hand pockets have watertight, coated zippers. Patagonia Pembroke Rain Jacket has adjustable cuffs and hem to seal out weather. Seam-sealed construction; center-front watertight, coated zipper; interior storm flap. Closeout.
short_description: The highly versatile men's Patagonia Pembroke Rain Jacket gives you rugged all-weather performance with a crisp, clean metropolitan design that fits in downtown or up in the mountains.
